ResourceHeader.ResourceName:
High speed solar wind streams and solar wind interaction regions
SIR CATALOGUE v1.0
ResourceHeader.Description: This is the HELIO4CAST high speed stream and stream interaction catalog (SIR), based on in situ magnetic field and bulk plasma observations in the heliosphere.

Parameter.Name: sircat_id:
Parameter.Description: sircat_id: The unique identifier for the observed stream interaction region (SIR). unit: string.

Parameter.Name: sc insitu
Parameter.Description: sc insitu: The name of the in situ observing spacecraft. unit: string.

Parameter.Name: sir_start_time
Parameter.Description: sir_start_time: Stream interaction region start time. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: hss_start_time
Parameter.Description: hss_start_time: High speed stream start time, equal to the stream interface time (for STEREO, MAVEN catalogs). unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: sir_end_time
Parameter.Description: sir_end_time: End time of the stream interaction region. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: hss_end_time
Parameter.Description: hss_end_time: High speed stream end time, criterion at Wind: speed < 450 km/s. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: hss_vtmax_time
Parameter.Description: hss_vtmax_time: High speed stream maxmimum speed time. unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: sc_heliodistance
Parameter.Description: sc_heliodistance: Heliocentric distance of the spacecraft at hss_start_time. unit: AU.

Parameter.Name: sc_long_heeq
Parameter.Description: sc_long_heeq: Heliospheric longitude of the spacecraft at hss_start_time, range [-180,180]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: sc_lat_heeq
Parameter.Description: sc_lat_heeq: Heliospheric latitude of the spacecraft at hss_start_time, range [-90,90]. unit: degree (HEEQ).

Parameter.Name: hss_vt_max
Parameter.Description: hss_vt_max: Maximum proton speed from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: hss_vt_mean
Parameter.Description: hss_vt_mean: Mean proton speed from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: hss_vt_std
Parameter.Description: hss_vt_std: Standard deviation of proton speed from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: km/s

Parameter.Name: hss_vt_mean
Parameter.Description: hss_vt_mean: Mean proton speed from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: km/s

Parameter.Name: hss_bt_max
Parameter.Description: hss_bt_max: Maximum total magnetic field from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_bt_mean
Parameter.Description: hss_bt_mean: Mean total magnetic field from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_bt_std
Parameter.Description: hss_bt_std: Standard deviation of total magnetic field from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_bz_min
Parameter.Description: hss_bz_min: Minimum Bz component (SCEQ) from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_bz_mean
Parameter.Description: hss_bz_mean: Mean Bz component (SCEQ) from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_bz_std
Parameter.Description: hss_bz_std: Standard deviation of Bz component (SCEQ) from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: hss_duration
Parameter.Description: hss_duration: Duration of high speed stream from hss_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: hours

Parameter.Name: ir_vt_mean
Parameter.Description: ir_vt_mean: Mean proton speed from hss_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: km/s

Parameter.Name: sir_vt_std
Parameter.Description: sir_vt_std: Standard deviation of proton speed from sir_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: km/s

Parameter.Name: sir_vt_mean
Parameter.Description: sir_vt_mean: Mean proton speed from hss_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: km/s

Parameter.Name: sir_bt_max
Parameter.Description: sir_bt_max: Maximum total magnetic field from sir_start_time to hss_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_bt_mean
Parameter.Description: sir_bt_mean: Mean total magnetic field from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_bt_std
Parameter.Description: sir_bt_std: Standard deviation of total magnetic field from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_bz_min
Parameter.Description: sir_bz_min: Minimum Bz component (SCEQ) from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_bz_mean
Parameter.Description: sir_bz_mean: Mean Bz component (SCEQ) from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_bz_std
Parameter.Description: sir_bz_std: Standard deviation of Bz component (SCEQ) from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: nT

Parameter.Name: sir_duration
Parameter.Description: sir_duration: Duration of stream interaction region from sir_start_time to sir_end_time. unit: hours
